channel.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
channel.description:
How should i go about this . .
i want it to be so if someone trades in varrock they will get message "you can only trade in GE" And enable trading to only happen in GE or a certain region.
317/PI
++

item.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Don’t forget the c.

if(c.absX > LOWEST_X) && (c.absX < HIGHEST_X) && (c.absY > LOWEST_Y) && (c.absY < HIGHEST_Y)){
return true;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can only trade in GE!”);
}

Read full topic
item.source: Make trading only possible in a certain area

item.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

thanks extreme ill keep you updated if it works.

im going to try this so i dont have to make a boolean >.>

if(absX > LOWEST_X) && (absX < HIGHEST_X) && (absY > LOWEST_Y) && (absY < HIGHEST_Y)){ return true; } else { c.sendMessage("You can only trade in GE!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Get Blitz:

:Obut its still going to show the option inother areas though, im not sure if he wants that

If will show but when a player trade’s in a area that isn’t GE it will give that message.

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:13, topic:405626”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=502620.msg3677153#msg3677153 date=1311306940]
Try something like this in TradeandDuel.java under the trading methods. Not sure it would work but it’s a guess.

if(c.inGE()) { return true; } else { c.sendMessage("You can only trade in GE!"); }
[/quote]
leech me much[/quote]
Lol, I forgot about that. And I’m sure you know I’m capable of writing that myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:11, topic:405626”]Find showOption trade or something like that in client.java and delete it

might have to find it in PlayAssistant and combatAssistant to[/quote]
Noo^

Trade.java add the boolean into player.java,

and in trade add something like,

	if (c.inGE()) {
		return true;
		} else {
		c.sendMessage("You can only trade inside the GE.");
	}

item.title: Make trading only possible in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

	public boolean inGE() 
	{
		if (absX > LOWEST_X) && (absX < HIGHEST_X) && (absY > LOWEST_Y) && (absY < HIGHEST_Y))
		{
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05

Try something like this in TradeandDuel.java under the trading methods. Not sure it would work but it’s a guess.

[/quote]

and he would have to add a ‘inGE’ variable. idiot.[/quote]

idfk thought it needed it.
